scripts.setup: npm run compile && snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 8 pot8_0000.ptau && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot8_0000.ptau pot8_0001.ptau --name="Dev" -e="entropy" && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot8_0001.ptau pot8_final.ptau && snarkjs groth16 setup circuit.r1cs pot8_final.ptau circuit_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey circuit_0000.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.setup:production: npm run compile && snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name="Production contribution" -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v && snarkjs groth16 setup circuit.r1cs pot12_final.ptau circuit_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey circuit_0000.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run dev
scripts.verify: node -e "const snarkjs = require('snarkjs'); console.log('SnarkJS version:', snarkjs.version || 'installed');"
